resources.string:
" It's a simple decision-making toy that operates using random numbers. 
 It's an improvement over flipping a coin as it offers more options. 
 Using it is straightforward: think of a specific question for which you struggle to find a solution. Then, simply press the 'roll' button and observe the result. 
 Remember, all final decisions remain your responsibility. This toy is just for fun and shouldn't be relied upon for serious or dangerous situations. 
 Best of luck, and enjoy!"

" Velbazhd Software LLC publishes the Vitosha Decision Maker. \n This is a straightforward decision-maker relying on random numbers. It features eight sectors with standard answers. When unsure about what course of action to take, spin the wheel and embrace your destiny. \n For updates on newer versions, visit: http://github.com/TodorBalabanov/VitoshaDM"
